title: Command Blocker config schema
description: JSON Schema for Command Blocker config

permission.description: The default permission for newly blocked commands.

messages.description: The default message(s) for newly blocked commands.
examples: <red>You do not have permission to execute this command.
<red>This command cannot be executed at this time.

forward.description: If true, the command will be forwarded from the proxy to the backend server. Only valid on Velocity.

updates.description: The options for the update checker

check.description: If true, the program will check for new versions.

announceUpdates.description: If true, the program will announce updates to administrator accounts.
